name: A-Social •Official•
description:
Welcome to A-Social, the 2D game that lets you experience the life of a teenager trapped in an endless loop of the same day. In this game, you will face a series of increasingly difficult mini-games to progress through the days.

This game is the perfect mix of challenge and reflection, which will immerse you completely in the daily life of a modern teenager. Every day brings new challenges and goals to achieve, which will require skill and quick reflexes to overcome.

But don't let its simplicity fool you, A-Social is a game that will keep you engaged and focused right from the start. With eye-catching 2D graphics and an immersive soundtrack, A-Social will make you feel like you're actually in the game.

So, if you're ready to put your skills to the test and take on the challenges of modern life, A-Social is the perfect game for you. Don't miss the opportunity to become the master of your life and challenge yourself to pass all levels of the game!
